ability: Once per round, after you roll a dice for an attack, you may reroll 1 attack or power die. You must keep the new result.
Each monster within 3 spaces of you receives -1 damage on all attack rolls (to a minimum of 1).
heroicFeat: Action: Perform an attack with a Magic weapon. This attack ignores range and targets each figure adjacent to you. 1 attack roll is made but each figure rolls defense dice separately.

ability: Each hero within 3 spaces of you (including yourself) gains "Surge: Recover 1 Heart" on all attack rolls.
When a minion monster begins its activation adjacent to you, it is Stunned.
heroicFeat: Action: Choose a monster within 3 spaces of you. Each monster in that monster group is Stunned.

ability: If you have not moved during this turn, you recover 2 Fatigue at the end of your turn.
heroicFeat: Use during your turn to choose a hero within 3 spaces of you. You and that hero may each immediately perform a move action. This is in addition to the 2 actions each hero receives on his turn.

ability: Each time you perform a rest action, you may immediately discard 1 Condition card from yourself.
heroicFeat: Use during your turn to perform 1 attack action. This is in addition to your 2 actions on your turn.

ability: If you are attacked while adjacent to at least one other hero, you may choose an adjacent hero and add the defense pool of that hero to your own.
heroicFeat: Action: Remove your figure from the map and place a hero token in your space. At the start of your next turn, place your figure in any empty space within 4 spaces of your hero token.

ability: When you suffer any amount of damage from an attack, you may choose to suffer some or all of that amount as Fatigue instead; you cannot suffer Fatigue in excess of your stamina.
heroicFeat: Action: You may move double your Speed and perform an attack. This attack may be performed before, after, or during this movement.
